::Surgital::

     Surgital got hit in the side of his head by two charges,=
 and growled out in rage.  Then, he felt two missiles hit his butt.

      =
 "OW!" Surgital yelled, jumping up a little, and rubbing his butt with his =
two hands. :)

        Then, the big one hit him.  The blast from the fusio=
n cannon was a weapon that was actually a match for him.  It hit him in the=
 back, and charred his back plating, as well as left a few small scratches.=
  The gestalt wasn't sure how much he could take.  But unlike everybody els=
e, he wouldn't seperate, yet...

          Surgital lifted up his leg, then=
, with all his might, sent it down to the ground, attempting to crush Cleda=
r.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Jen D. 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com 
  Sent: Sunday, May 06, 2001 8:05 PM
  Subject: Re: Out of the Fire

=

  (ooc: Robo, the hologram of the city ispretty much what you and yan deci=
ded 
  on it :)

  +++Mantle Cyndro Mist Rubble Aqua Cinder Cledar Forrior =
Rixer Truttle 
  Blyer+++

  Mantle smiled and then walked off toward the b=
ridge after watching Prowl 
  walk in with a few injured bots and then walk=
 out. He talked to Epyon while 
  he walked.

  "This ship was a big experi=
ment, but I think its very good. Hasn't failed us 
  yet." With that he ent=
ered the bridge and sat down at the commander's chair. 
  The bridge was a =
very big round room with computers all around, and the 
  commander's char =
was on a raised platform in the center, so that the 
  commander could over=
see everything that was going on. There were reports of 
  security cameras=
 and stanners and everything on the computer screens, some 
  even had comp=
uter games on them! Mantle tapped a few buttons and a 3d 
  hologram of a b=
attle city, at least how Cyndro had designed it from what 
  Mantle and Epy=
on had been talking about when they entered the Element. "How 
  does that =
look?" Mantle asked Epyon. "If its acceptable, we can begin 
  construction=
 right away."

  Even though missiles and laser shots were hitting the shie=
lds, the robots 
  inside probably couldn't tell that anything was differen=
t. The ship didn't 
  shake, the lights didn't blink, and everything remain=
ed the same. Outside, 
  however, Cyndro focused his firepower on the attac=
kers. Three missiles 
  launched out at Sixshot, and three at Ares, followe=
d by alot of plasma shots 
  at both. He also fired four missiles at Impris=
oner.



  Mist watched Surgital being attacked, and didn't waste time. She=
 aimed at 
  Surgital's head and fired two charges. Below her, Rubble fired=
 two missiles 
  up at Surgital's butt :), while Aqua and Cinder decided to=
 take down the 
  bots that Abominus just seperated into. They both turned =
around. Aqua fired 
  two spears at Hunger and Cinder fired three laser sho=
ts at Rippersnapper.



  Cledar looked around the battlefield and noticed =
that there were alot of 
  injured Maximals. He made a mental note to talk =
to the commander of this 
  faction after the battle, and then decided to f=
ire a few more times at 
  someone, and shot his fusion cannon up at Surgit=
al. He was sure that the 
  huge beam of plasma would hit.



  A large bur=
st of flame was shot out of Forrior's tank bottom and sent him 
  flying up=
 above the missile and the shots. He landed near Predator and fired 
  his =
fusion cannon at him almost form point-blank range.



  Rixer jumped forwa=
rd and avoided a missile coming at him, but several shots 
  still hit him =
in the side. He rolled under a bunch more shots and then 
  jumped up and f=
ired a missile and twenty shots at Sun Crusher.



  Truttle ducked under a=
 shot from Predator and chuckled to himself. So far 
  these Predacons were=
 very bad at fighting. He saw Reflector firing at Rixer, 
  aimed both of h=
is machine guns, and sent fifty laser bolts out toward 
  Reflector.



  T=
he missiles that Blyer fired earlier barely missed the Cybertronian Fire, 
=
  and hit the ground harmlessly. Blyer aimed again, this time with laser 
 =
 cannons, and fired twenty rapid laser shots from each of his wing cannons =
at 
  Firestarter.
